Interface manageValidation

    YIFApi, com.yantra.api.YSCApi

    public interface manageValidation

      The manageValidation API can be used to create, modify or delete validation

    • Method Detail

      • manageValidation

        org.w3c.dom.Document manageValidation(YFSEnvironment env,
                                      org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                               throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                      java.rmi.RemoteException

        The manageValidation API can be used to create, modify or delete validation

        The default Action for the API is Manage, which will act as Create if the specified record does not exist, or as Modify if it does exist. Additionally, Delete can be passed to remove an existing validation record and its references. User needs to create the input template before invoking this API. These validation will not be invoked automatically by existing APIs such as createOrder, changeOrder, ValidateItemForOrdering. User needs to explicitly invoke these validation via checkValidationRule and checkOverriddenRule API.

        ManageValidation Api will not be able to create, modify or delete system specified validations or their corresponding validation references.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        User Exits: None

        Events Raised: None

        Output Template Support: Yes

        Database Extensibility Support: No

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.
        Returns:
        An XML document that contains validation data. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
